title: Cyber insurance policies and breach response documentation
dataVerified: Insured business, coverage limits, breach response costs, forensic investigation
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Policy status (active/cancelled). Link to insurer system (authorized parties, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents fake cyber insurance (post-breach fraud). Domain binding verifies insurer. High-value claims ($500K-$10M+ typical). Breach notification requirements. Forensic investigation verification. Multi-page: Forensic reports multi-page.
